attributes.action: Second referendum on leaving the EU
attributes.additional_details: We were not clearly informed of the risks involved like the break-up of Great Britain and Gibraltar. The threats from France to move our border from Calais to Dover.
attributes.background: We the undersigned request Her Majesty's Government to consider a second referendum on leaving the EU once informal discussions have been made with the EU so we the citizens could clearly understand the gains and loses involved.
